_header: That the hasty or timely sowing
_description: Sow early or sow late? — one quatrain (abab)

BLLan210.Transcription:
That the hasty or tymly sowyngSom tyme yt faylythButt to late
                    sowyngSeldom or neuer wyll prevyth
BLLan210.Attributed Title: The sayeng of old housbond men (f. 80v)
BLLan210.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.252.
